reviews.review_msg: Thermo with THIS Dream Demolisher will be thee hardest C- you will ever work for in your life. I've never worked so hard in a class or done so much studying for everyone and myself to do so poorly on these impossible difficulty exams. Hardest class possible with hardest prof possible. Avoid if u can, I will tell my grandkids about him. Nice guy tho
Passion for teaching. A man with a plan no less. Quizzes on quizzes. 10/10

Passionate lecturer, wish he taught more courses in MSE. Makes you work hard, but if you do do all the homework itll pay off. His lectures are good, but he really pushes for participation so be ready. 4 exams no final, extra credit project.

Not allowed to say how I truly feel about this guy because it will get deleted for its vulgarity if I do. I will stick to the fact that not only is this guy a truly awful professor, but is also a terrible human being. His method of teaching is absolutely terrible and you will learn nothing yet he walks around like he is god's gift to earth.
All I'm saying is, if you have a chance choose another instructor. you are going to regret every moment of his class.
Worst professor ever. It's obvious he's not prepared for his lectures.  You have to deal with his grad students which complain alot
How dear you are? Taking a course from him?
GREAT, GREAT, GREAT! No bad comment

Well...he is the only choice u can take for 283 and 388, i took his 283... TOUGH prof, good in teaching, patient, but not really considering for his students. If u want to pass his course, stay with absolute awake in the class and try to do more homework... it is insane to take 6 engineering courses in a semester,and 283 is the hardest among them.
Stay consistent with homework, midterm and final exam are exact questions from the text book.  Good Prof and really passionate about his work.  Study hard, not a easy course by far.
